Maintain a consistent color tone or filter throughout the video for brand cohesion.

do_not_do: Avoid excessively long intros that delay core content delivery.
Do not rely heavily on effects that overshadow the core message.
Avoid cluttered frames with too many elements competing for attention.
Refrain from persistent background noise that distracts from main audio.
Do not use music that overpowers narration or significant sound cues.
Steer clear of overused stock footage that seems inauthentic.
Avoid inconsistent aspect ratios that disorient viewers.
Do not ignore platform-specific trends and filters that boost content visibility.
Avoid static shots that fail to create dynamic visual interest.
Do not place critical information in bottom thirds where UI elements may cover it.
Avoid using clickbait titles or thumbnails that misrepresent content.
Refrain from overly complex narratives that are hard to follow in short format.
